text: nævatat mūsā (tama janatāvaṭa) “oba lovehi æti janatāva siyallanma (deviyanṭa sampūrṇayenma) venaskam kaḷā vuvada, (ohuṭa kisima pāḍuvak æti vannē næta). mandayat niyata vaśayenma allāh (kisivekugē udavvak) avaśya novanneku vaśayen hā praśaṁsāvaṭa himi keneku vaśayen siṭinnēya” yayida pævasuvēya
